name: BREAK Into Motion Graphics
description:
Become a motion graphics ninja in less than a year. 

Joe Lilli, an industry professional with over ten years of experience, shows you the secrets of how to succeed in 3D, animation, and visual effects for television, film, and the web.

Learn tips from the pros on what hardware, software, and plugins to use, where to get free training and inspiration, how to create a kick-ass demo reel, network and build a portfolio, then get hired and become a rock star freelancer.
